alert.note: Alert for DuPage; Kendall; La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 9:11PM CDT until March 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging from 2 to 4 inches over northern portions of the counties to little or no accumulation southern portions of the counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Mainly northern portions of DuPage, La Salle and Kendall Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads will become covered with slushy snow accumulations and travel may become difficult for a period early Saturday morning during the period of heaviest snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates in excess of 1 inch per hour are possible for a brief period Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
